bio:
Erj is a deceased Breton conjurer and scholar in Skyrim who was interested in the Dwemer. His corpse is encountered within Nchuand-Zel's armory. His journal reveals that he was looting the ruins, and planned to buy a castle with what riches he found within.
During the quest "The Lost Expedition," the Dragonborn is tasked in restoring the ancient power of Nchuand-Zel, an ancient city buried below Markarth, and discover what happened to the missing expedition party that went exploring within the abandoned city.
name: Erj
